ygData.subject: Re: I know...
ygData.msgSnippet: Sol A is the one with the gnomes.  It is a serverly underutilized level 20-30 dungeon.  For some reason no one really goes there.  But as the only group there
ygData.messageBody:
Sol A is the one with the gnomes. It is a serverly underutilized level 20-30
dungeon. For some reason no one really goes there. But as the only group there
my friends and I spent level 20-27 there and leveled very quickly and relatively
safely. There was rarely more then us 4-6 people in the zone. Maybe 10 people
at the most.

Tony Buser wrote:

> From: "Tony Buser" <gr0k@...>
>
> > I would be very upset if that "third book" resided in an area that made it
> > difficult, if not impossible, for tinkers below level 35 to attain.
> >
> > Phenglei of Erollisi Marr
>
> I agree, I'm in a guild with some reasonably high level members (well high
> 20s low 30s) and they laughed at me when I asked them to go to solusek to
> look for tinkering info for me. :) They said they heard that lvl 50s run
> around there like newbies. hehe Well I'm only lvl 18 so I won't be
> exploring that area anytime soon.

--Eron
aeron@...
